original_text:
if I have kept my bread to myself,
    not sharing it with the fatherless—
korean_text: 나만 혼자 내 떡덩이를 먹고 고아에게 그 조각을 먹이지 아니하였던가

sentences.original_text: if I have kept my bread to myself
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 내 떡을 나만을 위해 간직했다면

sentences.original_text: not sharing it with the fatherless
